Articles.Content:
Latest from Star Citizen land is the CitizenCon presentation from Manchester somewhere under Concorde. A few reveals and updates, actors Gary Oldman, Mark Hamill and Gillian Anderson are acting and voicing for Squadron 42 plus several others.

Watch it here, starts at 27:20.

http://www.twitch.tv/starcitizen/v/20068257

There is a new ingenious referrals incentives system. If anyone wants to get involved and would like a Star Citizen referral code which gives both the user and the provider minor perks, you are welcome to use mine. I am already signed up for this game.

STAR-6KMF-77XT

https://robertsspaceindustries.com/referral-program
